incidents.name: Cloudflare Registrar unable to process operations for Identity Digital TLD domains

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Cloudflare is investigating issues with its Registrar services that impact some customers with Identity Digital TLD domains for new registrations, transfers and renewals operations.

See https://www.cloudflare.com/tld-policies/ for the list of Identity Digital TLDs.

Registration services for other TLDs are not impacted.

We are working to understand the full impact and mitigate this problem. More updates to follow shortly.

components.name: Registrar
components.description: Cloudflare Registrar securely registers and manages customer domain names

incidents.name: Cloudflare API service issues in China

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
The issue has been identified and Cloudflare is working on a fix.

Cloudflare is investigating issues with Cloudflare related APIs in China.

These issues do not affect the serving of cached files via the Cloudflare CDN or other security features at the Cloudflare Edge.

Customers using the Cloudflare APIs with IPv4 in China are impacted as requests might fail and/or errors may be displayed.

affected_components.name: Cloudflare Sites and Services - Support Site

incident_updates.body:
Our live chat system is currently experiencing issues - you may not be able to connect to report a technical issue via live chat. Please submit a ticket at https://dash.cloudflare.com/?to=/:account/support with your issue as an alternative, or if you are an Enterprise customer you can call the Enterprise telephone support hotline to reach a member of our Support team.

We will issue further updates on this status page as we work with our providers to resolve this issue.

incident_updates.body:
Investigation is ongoing. Current impact is limited to R2, Waiting Room, Stream Live, Queues, Durable Objects and single file CDN cache purge which may return HTTP 500 status code or Network connection lost errors.

Stream VOD (Video on Demand) and CDN cache purge by tag, host, prefix and purge everything are not affected.

We are working to mitigate this problem. More updates to follow shortly

affected_components.name: Cloudflare Sites and Services - CDN Cache Purge
Cloudflare Sites and Services - Waiting Room

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to investigate this issue.

affected_components.name: Cloudflare Sites and Services - Waiting Room

incident_updates.body: Cloudflare teams are continuing to investigate the issue.

Cloudflare is investigating issues with R2, Durable Objects, Queues and Stream Live availability.

Subset of customers that use Cloudflare R2, Waiting Room, Stream Live or Queues may observe HTTP 500 errors or Network connection lost errors when making requests to Durable Objects. VOD is unimpacted.

We are working to mitigate this problem. More updates to follow shortly.
